headline: Is Capital One (COF) Still Attractive After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Capital One Financial's share price still offers value at recent levels, it helps to step back and look at what the current market is actually pricing in. The stock most recently closed at US$233.20, with a 7 day return of a 6.9% decline, a 30 day return of a 2.0% decline, a year to date return of a 5.9% decline, and a 1 year return of 31.0%. The 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 138.8% and 126.7% respectively. These moves have come alongside ongoing investor...
